short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scanning configured websites for changes and forwards the changes over a socketIO connection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you searching for a solution to forward data seen in your browser to external sources? Well, then this tool is for you. Forward HTML, CSS and video player changes over to an existing SocketIO server.

The scenarios for this are multiple but one of them is if you are a streamer, you can create a simple currently playing overlay for YouTube and SoundCloud with minimal hassle.

You are not even required to write anything yourself since you can import others work with only a few clicks. 

The extension is made with simplicity in mind to make the experience as easy as possible but creating your very own presets/website listeners requires a limited understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
